items.title: Syllabus
items.content:
Course Syllabus

Outline the course description, learning objectives, required materials, grading breakdown, and major deadlines. Keep this page focused on the big picture of what learners will accomplish.

items.title: Lesson 1
items.content:
Lesson 1 Overview

Use this page to introduce the focus of Lesson 1 and how it connects to the rest of the course. Summarize what learners should know or be able to do after completing this lesson.

items.title: Lesson 1: Introduction
items.content:
Lesson 1 Introduction

Give learners context for this lesson: why the topic matters, how it connects to prior knowledge, and what questions they should keep in mind as they move through the content.

items.title: Lesson 1: Content
items.content:
Lesson 1 Content

Organize the main instructional materials for Lesson 1 here. Combine text, media, and interactive elements to guide learners through concepts, examples, and practice opportunities.

items.title: Lesson 1: Conclusion
items.content:
Lesson 1 Conclusion

Wrap up Lesson 1 by revisiting the learning objectives, summarizing key takeaways, and pointing learners toward next steps such as reflections, assessments, or the next lesson.
